author: AdrianoDee
body:
Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45694 (with the exception of [a comment](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/DataFormats/VertexSoA/interface/ZVertexDefinitions.h#L12-L23) that will anyway disappear soon).

This is useful because it allows to run 2024 Alpaka wfs in the PR testing, meaning we test also the Alpaka HLT.

Note: for Phase2, differently from `master` and `14_1_X` we use D98 wfs here (since it was the baseline for `14_0_X`).
title: [14_0_X] Update to `relval_gpu.py`for Alpaka and Pixel Triplets Alpaka Workflows
